OnboardingDescription1: Any book, that is read using Smart Reader, becomes your friend, advisor and ally forever.
OnboardingDescription2: Using Smart Reader you will realize what quantum physics is capable of. With the help of Smart Reader you will be able to work in a team, while at the same time communicate with friends and family!
OnboardingDescription3: Smart Reader is your guide and assistant on your journey towards success and prosperity!
